title: Create Interview: Enter Job Description
expected_result: AI suggests questions based on the job description

title: Create Interview: Use Enhanced JD Feature

steps.value: 2-year experienced JavaScript developer with AWS experience

expected_result: AI generates a complete job description

title: Create Interview: Set Difficulty Level
expected_result: Difficulty level is set to moderate

steps.value: How do you handle deployment with AWS?

title: Create Interview: Create Interview
expected_result: Interview is created and unique public interview link is displayed

title: Candidate Video Interview Response
steps: Visit the responses tab
Click on a candidate's video interview response
expected_result: The candidate's structured answers, video recordings, scores, and resume are displayed

title: View Interview Score and Communication Score
steps: Visit the responses tab
Click on a candidate's video interview response
View the interview score and communication score
expected_result: The interview score and communication score are displayed

title: View Comprehensive Summary of Interview
steps: Visit the responses tab
Click on a candidate's video interview response
View the comprehensive summary of the interview
expected_result: The comprehensive summary includes observations, positives, and negatives

title: Select or Reject Candidate
steps: Visit the responses tab
Click on a candidate's video interview response
Click on the action button to select or reject the candidate
expected_result: The candidate is selected or rejected successfully

title: Ré Screening - Create Interview and Upload Résumés
steps: Create a new interview
Upload multiple résumés
expected_result: The AI commences the screening process

title: View Ré Score and AI Recommendation
steps: Visit the ré screening section
View the ré score and AI recommendation for a candidate
expected_result: The ré score and AI recommendation are displayed

title: Decide to Reject or Advance Candidate
steps: Visit the ré screening section
View the ré score and AI recommendation for a candidate
Decide to reject or advance the candidate
expected_result: The candidate is rejected or advanced to the next round successfully

title: Send Interview Link to Candidate
steps: Decide to advance a candidate
Send an interview link to the candidate
expected_result: The interview link is sent to the candidate successfully

title: Review Interview Summary
steps: Candidate submits their interview
Initiate the interview screening process
View the summary of the interview
expected_result: The interview summary is displayed with observations, positives, and negatives
